COLOR_BACKGROUND.comment: Default background color for the whole app.

COLOR_BACKGROUND_ALT.comment: Second default background color for the app.

COLOR_BACKGROUND_ALT_2.comment: Used when further differentiation is needed because colorBackground and colorBackgroundAlt are both being used in close proximity.

COLOR_BACKGROUND_ALT_INVERSE.comment: Alternative background color for dark portions of the app.

COLOR_BACKGROUND_ROW_HOVER.comment: Used as the background color for the hover state on rows or items on list-like components.

COLOR_BACKGROUND_ROW_ACTIVE.comment: Used as the background color for the active state on rows or items on list-like components.

COLOR_BACKGROUND_ROW_SELECTED.comment: Used as the background color for selected rows or items on list-like components.

COLOR_BACKGROUND_ROW_NEW.comment: Used as the background color for the new state on rows or items on list-like components.

COLOR_BACKGROUND_INVERSE.comment: Default background color for dark portions of the app (like Stage Left or tooltips).

COLOR_BACKGROUND_ANCHOR.comment: Background color for the anchor area.

COLOR_BACKGROUND_BROWSER.comment: Secondary top bar background color (child browser, file preview, etc.)

COLOR_BACKGROUND_CHROME_MOBILE.comment: Background color for default mobile chrome (ex. global header)

COLOR_BACKGROUND_CHROME_DESKTOP.comment: Background color for default desktop chrome (ex. global header)

COLOR_BACKGROUND_CUSTOMER.comment: Background color for UI elements related to the concept of an external user or customer.

COLOR_BACKGROUND_ACTIONBAR_ICON_UTILITY.comment: Background for utility icons that live in the action bar on mobile.

COLOR_BACKGROUND_NOTIFICATION_NEW.comment: Background color for a new notification list item.

COLOR_BACKGROUND_ORG_SWITCHER_ARROW.comment: Stage left org switcher dropdown arrow background color.

COLOR_BACKGROUND_PAYLOAD.comment: Background color for payloads in the feed.

COLOR_BACKGROUND_SHADE.comment: Used as background for visual app builder.

COLOR_BACKGROUND_STENCIL.comment: Used as background for loading stencils on white background.

COLOR_BACKGROUND_STENCIL_ALT.comment: Used as an alternate background for loading stencils on gray backgrounds.

COLOR_BACKGROUND_TEMP_MODAL.comment: Used as the default background color for temporary dialog elements, such as the progress spinner background.

COLOR_BACKGROUND_TEMP_MODAL_TINT.comment: The color of the mask overlay that appears when you enter a modal state.

COLOR_BACKGROUND_TEMP_MODAL_TINT_ALT.comment: The color of the mask overlay that appears when you enter a modal state.

COLOR_BACKGROUND_SCROLLBAR.comment: The background color of an internal scrollbar.

COLOR_BACKGROUND_SCROLLBAR_TRACK.comment: The background color of an internal scrollbar track.

COLOR_BRAND_DARK.comment: Our product brand blue, darkened to meet accessibility color contrast ratios with white text.
